mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM BOARD_NOTICE WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'N'

SELECT NOTICE_NO AS noticeNo, NOTICE_TITLE AS noticeTitle, NOTICE_CONTENT AS noticeContent, NOTICE_CREATED_AT AS noticeCreateAt, NOTICE_UPDATED_AT AS noticeUpdateAt, NOTICE_STATUS AS noticeStatus, MEMBER.MEMBER_ID AS memNo FROM BOARD_NOTICE JOIN MEMBER ON MEM_NO = MEMBER_NO WHERE NOTICE_STATUS = 'N' ORDER BY NOTICE_NO DESC
SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memNo FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memNo }
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO BOARD_NOTICE VALUES ( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{ noticeTitle }, #{ noticeContent }, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, ( SELECT MEMBER_NO AS memNo FROM MEMBER WHERE MEMBER_ID = #{ memNo } ) )
